citation.article-title: Sulfitobacter pontiacus gen. nov., sp. nov. - a new heterotrophic bacterium from the Black Sea, specialized on sulfite oxidation.

p.s: Description of Sulfitobacter pontiacus sp. nov.
Sulfitobacter pontiacus (pont.ia.cus. Gr. adj. pontiacus, from the sea)
Includes two closely related strains with 90 - 95% of DNA homology.
Type strain ChLG lOis deposited in the Russian collection of microorganisms (collection number VKM B 2022).
